title: Color Palette Generator
description: Interactive tool to generate harmonious color palettes based on color theory principles.
content:
# Color Palette Generator

Create beautiful, harmonious color palettes for your design projects. This interactive tool uses color theory principles to generate complementary, analogous, triadic, and other color schemes.

## How to Use

1. **Start with a base color**: Click on the color picker or enter a hex value
2. **Choose harmony type**: Select from complementary, analogous, triadic, or split-complementary
3. **Adjust parameters**: Fine-tune saturation, brightness, and hue
4. **Export your palette**: Download as CSS, JSON, or Adobe Swatch file

## Features

- Real-time color preview
- Multiple harmony algorithms
- Accessibility compliance checking
- Export in various formats
- Save and load palettes
- Color blindness simulation

seo.title: Color Palette Generator - Free Online Design Tool
seo.description: Generate beautiful color palettes with this free online tool. Perfect for web design, branding, and digital art projects.

title: QR Code Generator
description: Generate custom QR codes with logo embedding, color customization, and multiple export formats.
content:
# QR Code Generator

Create custom QR codes for your business, events, or personal use. Add logos, customize colors, and download in multiple formats.

## Features

### Basic QR Generation
- **Text/URL**: Convert any text or URL to QR code
- **Contact Info**: Generate vCard QR codes
- **WiFi**: Create WiFi connection QR codes
- **Email**: Generate mailto QR codes

### Customization Options
- **Colors**: Custom foreground and background colors
- **Logo Embedding**: Add your logo to the center
- **Size Options**: Various resolution settings
- **Error Correction**: Multiple levels for reliability

### Export Formats
- PNG (transparent background support)
- JPG (for print applications)
- SVG (vector format for scaling)
- PDF (print-ready format)

## Use Cases

- Business cards and marketing materials
- Event tickets and invitations
- Restaurant menus and contact info
- Social media and website links
- Product packaging and labels

seo.title: QR Code Generator - Custom QR Codes with Logo
seo.description: Generate custom QR codes with logo embedding and color customization. Free online tool for business and personal use.

title: Text Counter & Analyzer
description: Comprehensive text analysis tool for character count, word count, reading time, and SEO optimization.
content:
# Text Counter & Analyzer

Comprehensive text analysis tool for writers, bloggers, and content creators. Get detailed statistics about your text including character count, word count, reading time, and SEO insights.

## Analysis Features

### Basic Counting
- **Characters**: Total characters with and without spaces
- **Words**: Word count with smart detection
- **Sentences**: Sentence count and average length
- **Paragraphs**: Paragraph count and structure analysis

### Reading Metrics
- **Reading Time**: Estimated reading time for average readers
- **Speaking Time**: Time needed to speak the text aloud
- **Complexity Score**: Text complexity analysis
- **Grade Level**: Reading level assessment

### SEO Analysis
- **Keyword Density**: Most frequent words and phrases
- **Title Suggestions**: SEO-optimized title recommendations
- **Meta Description**: Character count for meta descriptions
- **Social Media**: Character limits for various platforms

### Language Features
- **Multiple Languages**: Support for various languages
- **Encoding Detection**: Automatic character encoding detection
- **Unicode Support**: Full Unicode character support
- **Export Options**: Save analysis as CSV or PDF

## Perfect For

- Content writers and bloggers
- SEO professionals
- Students and academics
- Social media managers
- Email marketers

seo.title: Text Counter & Analyzer - Free Writing Tool
seo.description: Comprehensive text analysis tool with character count, word count, reading time, and SEO optimization features.

title: Pomodoro Timer
description: Productivity timer based on the Pomodoro Technique with customizable intervals and task tracking.
content:
# Pomodoro Timer

Boost your productivity with this customizable Pomodoro Timer. Based on the proven Pomodoro Technique, this tool helps you focus on tasks in manageable intervals.

## How It Works

The Pomodoro Technique breaks work into focused 25-minute intervals followed by short breaks:

1. **Work Period**: Focus on a single task for 25 minutes
2. **Short Break**: Take a 5-minute break
3. **Repeat**: Complete 4 work periods
4. **Long Break**: Take a 15-30 minute break

## Features

### Customizable Settings
- **Work Duration**: Adjust work period length (15-60 minutes)
- **Break Duration**: Customize short and long break times
- **Session Count**: Set number of sessions before long break
- **Auto-start**: Automatically start next period

### Task Management
- **Task List**: Add and manage your tasks
- **Task Timer**: Track time spent on each task
- **Progress Tracking**: Monitor completed pomodoros per task
- **Estimated Pomodoros**: Plan how many sessions each task needs

### Statistics & Insights
- **Daily Stats**: Track daily productivity metrics
- **Weekly Reports**: View weekly productivity trends
- **Task Analytics**: Analyze time spent on different tasks
- **Focus Score**: Measure your focus consistency

### Notifications & Alerts
- **Sound Alerts**: Customizable notification sounds
- **Visual Cues**: Screen flash and color changes
- **Browser Notifications**: Desktop notifications
- **Motivational Messages**: Encouraging messages between sessions

## Benefits

- Improved focus and concentration
- Better time management
- Reduced procrastination
- Enhanced productivity
- Stress reduction through regular breaks

seo.title: Pomodoro Timer - Free Productivity Tool
seo.description: Boost productivity with this customizable Pomodoro Timer. Task tracking, statistics, and notifications included.

title: AE Expression
description: After Effects expression generator with visual block-based interface for creating complex animations.
content:
# AE Expression

Generate After Effects expressions visually without coding. Perfect for motion graphics artists and animators who want to create complex animations without writing code.

## Features

### Visual Expression Builder
- **Block-based Interface**: Drag and drop expression components
- **Parameter Blocks**: Common animation parameters
- **Math Operations**: Mathematical functions and operators
- **Conditional Logic**: If/then/else statements

### Expression Library
- **Wiggle Effects**: Various wiggle and noise expressions
- **Bounce & Elastic**: Spring and bounce animations
- **Looping**: Seamless animation loops
- **Time-based**: Time-driven animations

### Advanced Features
- **Custom Variables**: Define and use custom variables
- **Layer References**: Reference other layers and properties
- **Expression Validation**: Real-time syntax checking
- **Export Options**: Copy expression code or save as presets

## Use Cases

- Motion graphics animations
- UI/UX animation prototypes
- Complex animation sequences
- Procedural animation systems
- Educational expression learning

seo.title: AE Expression - After Effects Expression Generator
seo.description: Generate After Effects expressions visually with drag-and-drop blocks. Perfect for motion graphics and animation.

title: Pi Game
description: Memory challenge game to test how many digits of Pi you can remember in sequence.
content:
# Pi Game

Test your memory and mathematical knowledge with this engaging Pi sequence challenge. How many digits of π can you remember?

## Game Features

### Progressive Challenge
- **Start Easy**: Begin with just 3.14
- **Increase Difficulty**: Add more digits as you progress
- **Mistake Tolerance**: Different difficulty levels
- **Speed Challenges**: Timed rounds for advanced players

### Learning Mode
- **Pi Facts**: Learn interesting facts about Pi
- **Digit Patterns**: Understand patterns in Pi's digits
- **Memory Techniques**: Tips for remembering long sequences
- **Historical Context**: The story behind Pi

### Scoring System
- **Personal Best**: Track your longest sequence
- **Accuracy Score**: Percentage of correct inputs
- **Speed Bonus**: Faster input = higher scores
- **Achievements**: Unlock badges for milestones

## Educational Benefits

- Improve number memory
- Learn mathematical concepts
- Develop pattern recognition
- Enhance concentration skills
- Fun way to learn about Pi

seo.title: Pi Game - Memory Challenge with Pi Digits
seo.description: Test your memory with this Pi sequence challenge game. Learn digits of Pi while having fun!

seo.title: ProtoType - PIXIjs Typing Game with GitHub Integration

title: Sequential PNG Preview
description: Preview sequential PNG files as animations directly in your browser without uploading.
content:
# Sequential PNG Preview

Preview sequential PNG files as smooth animations directly in your browser. Perfect for animators and designers working with frame sequences.

## Features

### Local File Processing
- **No Upload Required**: All processing happens locally
- **Multiple File Support**: Select multiple PNG files at once
- **Folder Support**: Load entire folders of sequential images
- **ZIP File Support**: Extract and preview from ZIP archives

### Animation Controls
- **Frame Rate Control**: Adjust playback speed (1-60 FPS)
- **Play/Pause**: Standard playback controls
- **Frame Navigation**: Jump to specific frames
- **Loop Settings**: Continuous or single-play modes

### Preview Options
- **Full Screen**: View animations in full screen
- **Zoom Controls**: Zoom in/out for detailed viewing
- **Grid View**: See all frames as thumbnails
- **Onion Skinning**: Overlay previous/next frames

### Export Features
- **GIF Export**: Convert sequence to animated GIF
- **MP4 Export**: Create video files from sequences
- **Frame Export**: Save individual frames
- **Settings Export**: Save timing and playback settings

## Use Cases

- Animation preview and review
- Frame sequence validation
- Client presentation preparation
- Animation timing adjustment
- Quick animation creation

seo.title: Sequential PNG Preview - Animation Preview Tool
seo.description: Preview sequential PNG files as animations in your browser. Local processing, no upload required.

title: SVG2TSX
description: Convert SVG files to optimized React TSX components with customizable options.
content:
# SVG2TSX

Convert SVG files to optimized React TSX components instantly. Perfect for developers who need to use SVG icons and graphics in React applications.

## Features

### SVG Processing
- **File Upload**: Upload SVG files directly
- **Code Input**: Paste SVG code directly
- **Batch Processing**: Convert multiple SVGs at once
- **Optimization**: Automatic SVG optimization

### Component Customization
- **Component Name**: Customize component names
- **Props Interface**: Generate TypeScript interfaces
- **Default Props**: Set default prop values
- **Styling Options**: Choose styling approach (CSS, styled-components, etc.)

### TypeScript Support
- **Full TypeScript**: Generate .tsx files with proper typing
- **Props Typing**: Automatic prop type generation
- **Interface Export**: Export TypeScript interfaces
- **JSDoc Comments**: Add documentation comments

### Export Options
- **Component File**: Download individual .tsx files
- **Batch Export**: Download all components as ZIP
- **Copy to Clipboard**: Quick copy for immediate use
- **Preview**: Live preview of generated components

## Use Cases

- React icon libraries
- SVG graphics in React apps
- Component library development
- Design system implementation
- Icon set conversion

seo.title: SVG2TSX - Convert SVG to React TSX Components
seo.description: Convert SVG files to optimized React TSX components with TypeScript support. Perfect for React developers.
